titles: Ukraine war: US fully backs Sweden and Finland Nato bids, Biden says
descriptions: Both countries submitted their applications to be part of the Western defence alliance this week.

titles: Ukrainian widow confronts Russian soldier accused of killing her husband
descriptions: The 21-year-old serviceman has pled guilty to killing her husband in a village in Ukraine's north-east.

titles: Ukraine war: One Russian's anti-war protest on the side of his shopping centre
descriptions: Dmitry Skurikhin has listed the Ukrainian towns attacked by Russia on the side of his shopping centre.

titles: North Korea: Fighting Covid with traditional medicine
descriptions: As Covid spreads in North Korea, state media urges the use of traditional medicine against the virus.

titles: Former Afghanistan official apologises for his role in the fall of the country
descriptions: Hamdullah Mohib fled the country along with the president the day the capital fell.

titles: Monkeypox cases investigated in Europe, US and Canada
descriptions: Cases of the rare disease are now confirmed in four European countries, health authorities say.

titles: Vangelis: Chariots of Fire and Blade Runner composer dies at 79
descriptions: The Greek musician won an Oscar for the 1981 film theme, and also wrote the Blade Runner soundtrack.

titles: Israeli coalition government in crisis as MP quits
descriptions: An Arab member resigns in anger, leaving the government as a fragile minority for the first time.

titles: Bush condemns Putin's invasion of 'Iraq' instead of Ukraine
descriptions: The former US president corrected himself after saying Putin had invaded Iraq rather than Ukraine.

titles: Russian McDonald's buyer to rebrand restaurants
descriptions: The fast food giant says the new owner of its 850 Russian restaurants will operate them under a new brand.

titles: Nnamdi Kanu: Nigerian separatist allowed to watch Liverpool games on TV
descriptions: A Nigerian judge grants Nnamdi Kanu dispensation to watch the climax of his favourite team's season.

titles: Women awarded damages over Japan exam discrimination
descriptions: Juntendo University in Tokyo set stricter requirements for female medical students in entrance exams.

titles: Australia election 2022: Cost of living worries voters
descriptions: If interest rates keep rising 300,000 Australians may default on mortgage repayments.

titles: Assam: The wild mushrooms killing India tea garden workers
descriptions: Workers in Assam's famed tea gardens are dying from eating wild mushrooms.

titles: Australia election: Why is Australia's parliament so white?
descriptions: Australia is a multicultural country, but critics say those representing the country don't reflect this.

titles: Russia's laser weapon claim derided as propaganda
descriptions: Moscow says it has destroyed a drone with a laser, but Kyiv says it can't mask battlefield failure.

titles: I learned to sing using YouTube - and now it's my career
descriptions: A holiday rep who was unable to sing teaches himself then scoops two music awards.

titles: LGBTQ+ in Qatar: 'Waking up in fear every day is exhausting'
descriptions: Fifa has said it will cancel the World Cup 2022 contracts of any hotel in Qatar that does not allow same-sex couples to stay.

titles: Meet Gleb and Ukraine's youth orchestra in exile in Slovenia
descriptions: A large group of talented young musicians and their families have been evacuated out of Ukraine into Slovenia.

titles: Woman kidnapped as a child reunites with rescuer
descriptions: Kathy Wrethman, from Australia, has finally come face-to-face with the man who saved her life.

titles: China's silenced feminist: How Sophia Huang Xueqin went missing
descriptions: BBC Eye investigates the disappearance of Sophia Huang Xueqin, a high-profile feminist journalist who kick-started China's #MeToo movement.

titles: Taylor Swift graduation speech: Embrace 'cringe'
descriptions: New York University bestowed the renowned pop singer with an honorary degree.
